Reference

Teal Core Functions

These are the main functions needed to build a teal app.

init()

Create the Server and UI Function For the Shiny App

module()

Create a module with a new shiny page

modules()

Create a collection of module and modules object

root_modules()

Create the root modules container

toString(<teal_module>)

Convert teal_module to a string

toString(<teal_modules>)

Convert teal_modules to a string

Teal Filtering and Selecting

Functions used to filter observations and select variables from dataset.

add_no_selected_choices()

Add empty choice to choices selected

all_choices()

An S3 structure representing the selection of all possible choices in a filter_spec, select_spec or choices_selected object.

choices_labeled()

Set "<choice>:<label>" type of Names

choices_selected()

Choices Selected

data_extract_spec()

Data Extract input for teal modules

filter_spec()

Data extract filter specification

get_variable_labels()

Function that extract column labels from CDISC dataset

is.choices_selected()

Check if an object is a choices_selected class.

select_spec() select_spec.delayed_data() select_spec.default()

Column selection input specification

value_choices()

Wrapper on choices_labeled to label variable values basing on other variable values

variable_choices()

Wrapper on choices_labeled to label variables basing on existing labels in data

Teal modules UI

Functions used to filter observations and select variables from dataset.

optionalSelectInput()

Hide, Show Label only or display a pickerInput

optionalSliderInput()

if min or max are NA then the slider widget will be hidden

optionalSliderInputValMinMax()

For teal modules we parameterize an optionalSliderInput with one argument value_min_max

updateOptionalSelectInput()

Update optionalSelectInput

Delayed Dataset Constructors

For creating delayed dataset objects.

cdisc_dataset()

Create a new object of CDISCTealDataset class

cdisc_dataset_file()

Load CDISCTealDataset object from a file

dataset()

Constructor for TealDataset class

dataset_file()

Load TealDataset object from a file

mae_dataset()

Public facing constructor for MAETealDataset

Delayed Dataset Connectors Constructors

For creating delayed dataset objects.

cdisc_data_connector()

Public facing object constructor for CDISCTealDataConnector class.

cdisc_dataset_connector()

Create a new CDISCTealDatasetConnector object

dataset_connector_file() cdisc_dataset_connector_file()

Load TealDatasetConnector object from a file

cdse_dataset_connector() cdse_cdisc_dataset_connector()

CDSE TealDatasetConnector

code_dataset_connector() code_cdisc_dataset_connector()

Code TealDatasetConnector

csv_dataset_connector() csv_cdisc_dataset_connector()

csv TealDatasetConnector

data_connection()

Public facing object constructor for TealDataConnection class.

datasetdb_dataset_connector()

DataSetDB TealDatasetConnector

dataset_connector()

Create a new TealDatasetConnector object

fun_dataset_connector() fun_cdisc_dataset_connector()

Function Dataset Connector

python_dataset_connector() python_cdisc_dataset_connector()

Python TealDatasetConnector

rds_dataset_connector() rds_cdisc_dataset_connector()

RDS TealDatasetConnector

relational_data_connector()

Public facing object constructor for TealDataConnector class.

rice_dataset_connector() rice_cdisc_dataset_connector()

Rice TealDatasetConnector

scda_dataset_connector() scda_cdisc_dataset_connector()

scda TealDatasetConnector

script_dataset_connector() script_cdisc_dataset_connector()

Script TealDatasetConnector

snowflake_dataset_connector() snowflake_cdisc_dataset_connector()

Snowflake TealDatasetConnector

teradata_dataset_connector() teradata_cdisc_dataset_connector()

Teradata TealDatasetConnector

Delayed Data Connection Constructors

For creating delayed dataset objects.

cdse_connection()

Open connection to CDSE

datasetdb_connection()

Open connection to DataSetDB

rice_connection()

Open connection to entimICE via rice

ricepass_connection()

Open connection to entimICE via ricepass

snowflake_connection()

Open connection to Snowflake

snowflake_connection_function()

Helper function to connect to Snowflake

teradata_connection()

Open connection to Teradata

Delayed Data Constructors

For creating delayed data objects.

cdisc_data()

Data input for teal app

cdisc_data_file()

Load CDISCTealData object from a file

cdse_data()

TealDataConnector connector for CDSE

datasetdb_data()

TealDataConnector connector for DataSetDB

rice_data()

TealDataConnector connector for RICE

snowflake_data()

TealDataConnector connector for SNOWFLAKE

teal_data()

Teal data

teal_data_file()

Load TealData object from a file

teradata_data()

TealDataConnector connector for TERADATA

Delayed Dataset Functions

For loading and modifying delayed data objects.

as_cdisc()

Convert a TealDataset(Connector) object to a CDISCTealDataset(Connector) object

callable_code()

Create CallableCode object

callable_function()

Create CallableFunction object

get_attrs()

Get dataset attributes

get_cdisc_keys()

Function that returns the default keys for a CDISC dataset by name

get_code()

Get code

get_dataname()

S3 method for getting a dataname(s) of (TealDataAbstract, (TealDatasetConnector or TealDataset) R6 object

get_dataset()

Get dataset from TealDatasetConnector

get_dataset_label()

S3 method for getting a label of (TealDatasetConnector or TealDataset) R6 object

get_datasets()

Get a TealDataset objects.

get_keys()

Get dataset primary keys

get_raw_data()

Retrieve raw data

is_pulled()

Is pulled

load_dataset()

Load data from connection

load_datasets()

Load datasets

mutate_data()

Mutate data by code

mutate_dataset()

Mutate dataset by code

mutate_join_keys()

Mutate JoinKeys with a new values

resolve_delayed()

Resolve delayed inputs by evaluating the code within the provided datasets

resolve_delayed_expr()

Resolve expression after delayed data are loaded

set_args()

Set arguments of a CallableFunction

set_keys()

Set dataset primary keys

Helpers

Other useful functions for users and developers.

bookmarkableShinyApp()

Make a Shiny UI function bookmarkable

bookmark_module()

Bookmarking module

data_label()

Get dataset label attribute

`data_label<-`()

Set dataset label attribute

debug_browser_module()

Module that calls browser() on button click

deep_clone_r6()

Helper function to deep copy R6 object

default_filter()

Refers the default filter state

execute_in_next_cycle()

Execute the expression in the next reactive cycle

filter_calls_module()

Dummy module to show the filter calls generated by the right encoding panel

filter_spec_internal()

Data extract dynamic filter specification

get_binding_name()

Gets the name of the binding

get_dummy_cdisc_data()

Get dummy CDISC data

get_dummy_datasets()

Get a dummy datasets object with ADSL data, useful in the examples

get_dummy_filter()

Get dummy filter states to apply initially

get_dummy_modules()

Get dummy modules

get_filterable_varnames()

Gets filterable variable names

get_filter_expr()

Gets filter expression for multiple datanames taking into account its order.

get_key_duplicates()

S3 generic for creating an information summary about the duplicate key values in a dataset

get_key_duplicates(<data.frame>)

Creates a short information summary about the duplicate key values in a dataset.

get_key_duplicates(<TealDataset>)

Creates a short information summary about the duplicate primary key values in a dataset

get_key_duplicates_util()

Creates a duplicate keys information summary.

get_labels()

Function that extract labels from CDISC dataset

init_filtered_dataset()

Initializes FilteredDataset

init_filter_state()

Initializes FilterState

init_filter_states()

Initialize FilterStates object

join_key()

Create a relationship between a pair of datasets

join_keys()

Create a JoinKeys out of a list of JoinKeySet objects

log_app_usage()

Teal Application Usage Logging.

no_selected_as_NULL()

Check select choices for no choice made

predefined_filters_module()

Add predefined filters with a button click

print(<choices_labeled>)

Print choices_labeled object

print(<teal_module>)

Print teal_module

print(<teal_modules>)

Print teal_modules

python_code()

Python Code

read_script()

Read .R file into character

register_logger()

Registers a logger instance in a given logging namespace.

reset_filters_module()

Reset filters for the specified datasets

run_js_files()

Run JS file from /inst/js/ package directory

set_filter_state()

Sets the filter state in FilterState object

split_by_sep()

Split by separator

stop_shiny()

Stop app.R evaluation with a Jumbotron Shiny App

trigger_after_first_cycle()

Activates the reactive expression after the first reactive flush of Shiny, This is useful when the UI does not exist yet and we want to wait for it Note that this triggers the first time due to the timer and from then on due to the expression being evaluated.

`%>%`

Pipe operator

`%is_in%`

List element in other list

For Developers

R6 Classes

Abstract and concrete classes used to build teal functionality.

Callable

A Callable class of objects Object that stores function name with its arguments. Methods to get call and run it.

CallableCode

A CallableCode class of objects Object that stores code to reproduce an object. It includes methods to get or run the code and return the object.

CallableFunction

A CallableFunction class of objects Object that stores function name with its arguments. Methods to get call and run it.

CallablePythonCode

A CallablePythonCode class of objects

CDISCTealData

Manage multiple CDISCTealDataConnector, CDISCTealDatasetConnector and CDISCTealDataset objects.

CDISCTealDataConnector

Manage multiple and TealDatasetConnector of the same type.

CDISCTealDataset

R6 Class representing a dataset with parent attribute

CDISCTealDatasetConnector

A CDISCTealDatasetConnector class of objects Objects of this class store the connection function to fetch a single dataset. The difference compared to the inherited class is a parent field that indicates name of the parent dataset. Note that the parent field might be empty (i.e. character(0)).

CDISCFilteredData

Class to encapsulate relational filtered datasets with its parents.

CDISCFilteredDataset

CDISCFilteredDataset R6 class

ChoicesFilterState

FilterState object for factor or character variable

CodeClass

Code Class

dataset(<MultiAssayExperiment>)

S3 method to construct an MAETealDataset object from MultiAssayExperiment

DateFilterState

FilterState object for Date variable

DatetimeFilterState

FilterState object for POSIXct variable

DefaultFilteredDataset

DefaultFilteredDataset R6 class

DFFilterStates

Initializes DFFilterStates object

EmptyFilterState

FilterState object for empty variable

FilteredData

Class to encapsulate filtered datasets

FilteredDataset

FilterStates R6 class

FilterState

Abstract class to encapsulate filter states

FilterStates

FilterStates R6 class

JoinKeys

R6 Class to store relationships for joining datasets

LogicalFilterState

FilterState object for logical variable

MAEFilteredDataset

MAEFilteredDataset R6 class

MAEFilterStates

Initialize MAEFilterStates object

MAETealDataset

R6 Class representing a MultiAssayExperiment object with its attributes

MatrixFilterStates

Initialize MatrixFilterStates object

PythonCodeClass

A CallablePythonCode class of objects

Queue

R6 Class - A First-In-First-Out Abstract Data Type

RangeFilterState

FilterState object for numeric variable

ReactiveQueue

Reactive extension of Queue class

SEFilterStates

Initialize SEFilterStates object

TealData

Manage multiple TealDataConnector, TealDatasetConnector and TealDataset objects.

TealDataAbstract

TealDataAbstract class

TealDataConnection

A TealDataConnection class of objects Objects of this class store the connection to a data source. It can be a database or server (RICE) connection.

TealDataConnector

Manage multiple and TealDatasetConnector of the same type.

TealDatasetConnector

A TealDatasetConnector class of objects Objects of this class store the connection function to fetch a single dataset. Note that for some specific connection types, an object of class TealDataConnection must be provided. Data can be pulled via the pull method and accessed directly through the dataset active binding. Pulled data inherits from the class TealDataset

srv_teal_with_splash()

Server function that loads the data through reactive loading and then delegates to srv_teal.

ui_teal_with_splash()

UI to show a splash screen in the beginning, then delegate to srv_teal

Unexported Functions

These functions are useful for teal developers.

check_in_range()

Check that a given range is valid

check_in_subset()

Check that one set is a subset of another

check_pkg_quietly()

Check if package can be loaded

code_exclude()

Exclude from code

code_from_script()

Get code from script

enclosed_with()

Get code enclosed within

enclosed_with_dataname()

Get code enclosed within

extract_choices_labels()

Extract labels from choices basing on attributes and names

extract_raw_choices()

Extract raw values from choices

find_source_code()

Finds lines of code with source call

get_client_timezone()

Get Client Timezone

get_code_single()

Get code

include_css_files()

Include CSS files from /inst/css/ package directory to application header

include_js_files()

Include JS files from /inst/js/ package directory to application header

include_source_code()

Includes source in preprocessing code lines

include_teal_css_js()

Code to include teal CSS and Javascript files

modules_depth()

Get module depth

picker_options()

Create choicesOpt for pickerInput

picker_options_content()

Optional content for optionalSelectInput

pretty_code_string()

Format a vector of code into a string

srv_nested_tabs()

Server function that returns currently active module

srv_tabs_with_filters()

Server function

srv_teal()

Server function corresponding to teal

text_to_call()

Create call from string

topological_sort()

Topological graph sort

to_relational_data()

S3 generic for to_relational_data function.

ui_nested_tabs()

Create a UI of nested tabs of teal_modules

ui_tabs_with_filters()

Add right filter panel into each of the top-level teal_modules UIs.

ui_teal()

Teal app UI

variable_type_icons()

Get icons to represent variable types in dataset

variable_types()

Get classes selected columns from dataset
